issue.title: [Docs] Codecov badge in main Readme only applies to Rust
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12423](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12423). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The badge in https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/README.md links to https://app.codecov.io/gh/apache/arrow, which seems to only show the coverage for the Rust code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12423?focusedCommentId=17324611) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
